channel.title: Need help changing ip to connect to server Jolt V2
channel.description: I am having problems changing the clients ip to connect to my server. Also i need help on what to do if my friend wanted to connect to me.

item.title: Need help changing ip to connect to server Jolt V2
item.dc:creator: @jjxproxhd jjxproxhd
item.description:
@jjxproxhd wrote:

This is what i found do i change the 127.0.0.1 to my external ip?

	if (BITConfigsLoader.liveModeWhere != Class41_Sub29.modeWhere) {
		if (!Class296_Sub51_Sub27_Sub1.method3160(Class41_Sub29.modeWhere, 30618)) {
			if (Class41_Sub29.modeWhere == Class296_Sub34_Sub2.localModeWhere) {
				Class338_Sub8.gameWorld.ipAddress = "[u]127.0.0.1[/u]";
				Class338_Sub8.gameWorld.anInt1156 = Class338_Sub8.gameWorld.worldID + 40000;
				Class338_Sub3_Sub3_Sub1.lobbyWorld.ipAddress = "[u]127.0.0.1[/u]";
				Class338_Sub3_Sub3_Sub1.lobbyWorld.anInt1156 = (40000 +

i cut the file short in case you were wondering these were the only things i found out of the search of “no-ip.org”, “0.0.0.0”, “127.0.0.1”

item.title: Need help changing ip to connect to server Jolt V2
item.dc:creator: @silicoofficial silicoofficial
item.description:
@silicoofficial wrote:

First go to http://www.findmyip.com/ and write down the ip address it gives you. This is your external ip address, in which people outside of your network can connect to you. Next, go into your server’s client files and search for either “127.0.0.1”, “0.0.0.0”, or “.no-ip”. You should be able to find this in either client.java, egui.java, or gui.java. If you can’t find it in either one of those, just try searching your whole client folder. However, when you do find one, replace it with your external ip address (the ip address you found on http://www.findmyip.com/). Oh, and if you want your friend to be able to connect, download and install Winrar, right click your client folder, click on “Add to YOURCLIENTNAME.rar”, let that compress the folder, go to http://www.uppit.com/ upload YOURCLIENTNAME.rar and once it’s done uploading, give your friend the link that it gave you, have him download YOURCLIENTNAME.rar and you guys will be able to play your server together! Also, he has to have Winrar installed to right click YOURCLIENTNAME.rar and click “Extract Here”. Hope this helped!

Read full topic
item.source: Need help changing ip to connect to server Jolt V2
